notes: Upon cast, creates an illusion of the caster, and shuffles their positions. The reappear locations are based on the caster's position upon cast, with one of them appearing at the cast location, and the other north, east, south or west from that point. The distance between the hero and the illusion is 108 range if the hero has a collision size of 24, and 72 if the collision size is 8. Though the formation is always the same, the caster and the illusion take a random position in the formation and have all the same facing angle.
